group_1.narration: The preparations went well@and the school festival was able to@be held safely!
< On the Day of the Festival>
In the gym, the Gymnastics Club and Choir Club@are fighting over which gets to use the stage first...!@If there are any committee members available,@please come mediate...!
There's a report of a dispute between the@Volleyball Club and Chess Club at the food stalls@over where their customers should line up!
It looks like the Judo Club who stormed@into the Literature Club's clubroom@is being beaten to a pulp, and@they kind of deserve it, but@someone should still go save them!

group_1.textLeft: Th-there's trouble...reports of trouble@won't stop coming...!
The school is in complete chaos...!

group_1.textRight: Isn't this because you fired up the@sports clubs and culture clubs...?
I wouldn't say it's entirely your fault...
They were incompatible with each other to@begin with...

group_1.textCenter: If you're going to fight, do it over sales...!

group_1.textRight: The sales showdown between the two clubs@was just the last straw that set them off.
...I guess it would be more correct to say that?

group_1.textLeft: It's probably my fault...! I have to stop this@somehow...!
Oh, there's another report of trouble...!

group_1.narration: In the schoolyard, the representatives of@the culture clubs and sports clubs@are fighting over Sayuki Fumino,@and the scene is complete chaos...@Committee members need to get here ASAP!

group_1.textLeft: And those two haven't learned their lesson@at all...!
Tsumugi Wakana reporting in!@I'm on the way...!

group_1.narration: In the end...@The school festival ended while@repeating that process...@After one trouble was contained,@another trouble occurred, and then@more trouble showed up after that...
The school festival didn't turn out fun at all...
I didn't even have time to taste delicious food...
